testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: The Payroll page should have a search textBox for searching within the Paylist.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user verifies that they are on the mainLogin page..................passed And The user clicks on the Admin Login button...............................passed And The user switchs to an other new Admin Login page.......................passed And The user enters their mail address and password to the mailtextbox and passwordtextbox.passed And The user clicks on the Sign In button...................................passed And The user clicks on the profile icon on the admin panels top bar.........passed And The user clicks on the profile link.....................................passed And The user verifies that they are linked to the profile page..............passed When The user clicks on the payroll link button.............................passed Then The user verifies that, the Payroll page has a search textBox for searching within the Paylist..passed
